author: spearmankahron@gmail.com (Kahron Spearman)
title: Lady Gaga's Isolated, Soaring Super Bowl Vocals Will Blow You Away
text:
Screengrab via Pepsi/Youtube BTW 
Lady Gaga ‚Äôs Super Bowl LI halftime performance was a dream come true for the singer. Supported by incredible stunts, a fleet of drones, and fireworks displays, it makes for a grand show. But Gaga‚Äôs actual singing carried the whole spectacle‚Äîjust check the isolated audio feed from the 13-minute performance. Lady Gaga's isolated vocals from her 2017 Super Bowl Halftime performance. üé§üë∏ pic.twitter.com/OwlyCvunEs ‚Äî Lady Gaga (@AMENARTPOP) February 14, 2017 
At times, the occasional shock and shimmer of the spectacle overshadows her electric voice, but there‚Äôs no mistaking evidence of its strength. 
Here‚Äôs the feed from her most recent Saturday Night Live performance: 
Metallica seems to have noticed. The legendary metal rockers decided to up the ante on their Grammy collaboration‚Äî which was sullied by technical difficulties ‚Äîtelling Rolling Stone they plan to press ‚Äúfast-forward to the next chapter‚Äù in working with Gaga in the near future. 
If the grizzly vets are Team Gaga, why aren't you?
